rules.natural: If the conservation team has authorization to study the research substance, then the conservation team collects the research substance from the protected forest
If the conservation team finds toxic properties in the research substance, then the agency does not approve commercial use of the research substance

rules.prover9_expression: (recommends(science_board, commercial_approval, synthetic_version) -> (-(completes(conservation_team, clinical_trials, synthetic_version) -> benefits(endangered_species, conservation_efforts)) -> -continues(conservation_team, field_research, protected_forest)))
rules.natural: If the science board recommends commercial approval of the synthetic version, then if the completion of clinical trials of the synthetic version by the conservation team does not result in the endangered species benefiting from conservation efforts, then the conservation team does not continue field research in the protected forest

rules.prover9_expression: (recommends(science_board, research_continuation, synthetic_version) -> (-(completes(conservation_team, clinical_trials, synthetic_version) -> benefits(endangered_species, conservation_efforts)) -> -continues(conservation_team, field_research, protected_forest)))
rules.natural: If the science board recommends research continuation for the synthetic version, then if the completion of clinical trials of the synthetic version by the conservation team does not result in the endangered species benefiting from conservation efforts, then the conservation team does not continue field research in the protected forest
